Evaluation: Uncertainty Visualization

Case-1 The tumor is present in the left frontal lobe and nearby corticospinal tract. Left: Fiber bundle obtained from original tensor volume by using deterministic fiber tracking. A fixed safety margin is drawn as an outline in blue. Right: 150 variations of the same bundle based on uncertainty simulation.

Case-2 The tumor is present in the left temporal lobe and nearby inferior fronto-occipital fasiculusl tract. Left: Fiber bundle obtained from original tensor volume by using deterministic fiber tracking. A fixed safety margin is drawn as an outline in blue. Right: 150 variations of the same bundle based on uncertainty simulation.
